page.title: 08Thamesdown trail Park.
page.content: {Thamesdown Trail Training Park}is a place where youngsters learn to ride their{motorbikes}safely. It is situated between two railway lines and the River Ray and is well away from houses.It was started because some young people were making too much noise on their motorbikes near to peoples houses.Anyone is allowed to go and it costs Â£1.00 for half an hour. If you have your own motorbike or you are{disabled}the charge is 50p. There are three tracks. Track 1 is for people who are learning to ride a motorbike.Track 2 is for people who can ride quite well,and track 3 which is 1.5km long is for advanced riders.They have one 3 wheeler for disabled people and they have 11 more motorbikes of different sizes. There are two full time and five part time staff.They are paid by the{M.S.C.
